data.name: Mythos Ever After: A Cthulhu Dating Sim RX  + Other Soundtracks from 2021
data.detailed_description:
Contains an added (small) dialogue at the beginning of the game between the Cthulhu twins, plus an updated credits page to include the new musicians.

Track List

Dream 01
Dream 02 - Winner's Circle
Dream 03 - Hamlet
Halloween Retail 01
Halloween Retail 02 - Christmas
Halloween Retail 03 - Food Court
Halloween Retail 04 - Big Spooky
Midsummer 01
Midsummer 02 - Magnusball
Midsummer 03 - Slasher
Midsummer 04 - Walk
Small Town 01
Small Town 02 - Christmas
Small Town 03 - College Fight Song
Small Town 04 - Woods
Small Town 05 - Fae
Small Town 06 - Dew
Small Town 07 - Fae II
Small Town 08 - Updraft
Small Town 09 - Dance
Small Town 10 - Clean
Small Town 11 - Penultimate
Small Town 12 - Outro

About

Contains multiple tracks from all of Stegalosaurus' games for 2021 in .mp3 format, from both released and unreleased titles.

To install and listen

- Download the DLC.
- The music folder will be located in the game folder where your Steam game folders are located (steamapps/common/[game])

It will be in the folder: '2021 SGDC MUSIC DLC'.
